title: Marissa Mayer's new startup Dazzle, which is building next-gen AI personal assistants, raised an $8M seed at a $35M valuation and plans to exit stealth in 2026 (Marina Temkin/TechCrunch)
summary: Marina Temkin / TechCrunch: Marissa Mayer's new startup Dazzle, which is building next-gen AI personal assistants, raised an $8M seed at a $35M valuation and plans to exit stealth in 2026 â€” The former Yahoo CEO, Marissa Mayer, refuses to sit on the sidelines of the generative AI revolution.
